Articles.Content:
Hello, In one of my update videos on my youtube channel earlier in April I made a deal with my viewers that if we got my subscriber count up to 200 by May then I'd be holding my first contest and giving away a copy of don't starve. I figured I'd try and outsource here too. Currently were at about 170 subs so its not much further to go. My channel is all gaming and I try to play a lot of different stuff, a lot of it is about trying to show off games people may not know about of play otherwise, I also play KSP and sometimes more common games. I pretty usually have a video every day. So give it a look and subscribe if you wanna support me, if you don't I wont cry, much. =P

YouTube Link

Ether way, I appreciate the look.
